title: Bitcoin Battle: Saylor’s Dream Meets Chanos’ Reality
description: Billionaire Michael Saylor and short-seller Jim Chanos clash over Strategy’s $8B Bitcoin gains. Is it genius financial engineering—or just hype with leverage?
content: Michael Saylor, co-founder and executive chairman of MicroStrategy Inc., speaks during the Bitcoin ... More 2025 conference in Las Vegas, Nevada, US, on Thursday, May 29, 2025. The event will examine… [+8755 chars]
